original_text: None of his sins that he hath committed shall be mentioned unto him: he hath done that which is lawful and right; he shall surely live.
korean_text: 그가 본래 범한 모든 죄가 기억되지 아니하리니 그가 반드시 살리라 이는 정의와 공의를 행하였음이라 하라

sentences.original_text: None of his sins that he hath committed shall be mentioned unto him:
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 범한 죄는 그에게 언급되지 않을 것이다:

sentences.original_text: he hath done that which is lawful and right;
